page.title: 20 Street Games Contd.
page.content: Polo, Pick a pot of flowers, Toss the cat, It's a bomb, Hallas and TV. programmes. It is possible that some were unknown as they use modern technology in their ideas and rules(e.g. TV programmes) which was not so widespread in our parent's day. Some games are very old like Ring o' Roses which is a rhyme about the Black Death. These have been passed down from parent to child for centuries. Games also change their names over time and distance as the last sample shows. 1985 Name 1955 Name Knocky Nine Doors Knock Down Ginger Twiggy Tig Kiss,cuddle,ortorture Truth,dare,force Sticky in the mud Stuck Tight Kicky the can Tin in 'ring
